talk.utter: One problem was bragging about inflation numbers when the numbers didn't reflect food and energy prices, which is how most people experience inflation on a day to day basis (notably since the 2022 food and energy price shocks). People felt like they were being bamboozled.

talk.utter: People felt like they were being bamboozled while simultaneously spending money as if the economy is doing great. It makes no sense.
